overview: A teenage rock band performs their music for a small audience. At the end of their performance, lead singer Lacy who is in love with one of the members, gets a text from her mother to invite the band to her familyâ€™s factory, possibly for jobs. However, the family has a dark secret that will forever transform or fatally devour their friendship.
tagline: The job is great, but the boss is a monster.
title: Hybrid Hazards
